import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams,Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { selectedStock } from '../../Redux/actions/stockActions'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const StockDetails = () => { const stock = useSelector((state)=>state.stock) console.log(stock) const history = useHistory() const {StockId}=useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); console.log('stockid: ' + StockId) const config = { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}` } }; const axiosStockDetail = async () => { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:18598/api/Stok/GetSelectedStock='+StockId, config) .catch(error => { if (error.response.status == '401') { console.log('döndürüom') history.push("/Login") } }) console.log(response) dispatch(selectedStock(response.data)); }; useEffect(()=> { if(StockId && StockId !=="") axiosStockDetail(); },[StockId]); return (
